1.1.2.name: wordpress/social-media-counters
1.1.2.description:
Update - 19/07/2012 Apologies for lack of response and updates. I am now free to work on this plugin again, and there will be a major update to the plugin this weekend. Thank you for your patience and support.

Official plugin page with detailed instructions at http://www.philhancox.co.uk/social-media-counters-wordpress-plugin

This plugin adds social media counters to your blog posts from many services including Twitter, Facebook and the brand new Google +1. Full list of services so far:

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Google Buzz
  • Google +1
  • LinkedIn
  • Digg
  • StumbleUpon
  • AddThis

Flexibility

  • Configure buttons for top of posts, bottom of posts and excerpts.
  • Select thin, compact buttons or vertical, tall counters.
  • Enable on posts, pages and even custom post types if you h
